Title: WPF Datagrid Conditional Formatting
Description: The conditional formatting library allows the formatting of several datagrid elements based on given conditions. It currently works with the datagrid control of the WPF Toolkit and is written entirely in C#.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The conditional formatting library allows the formatting of several datagrid elements based on given conditions. It currently works with the datagrid control of the WPF Toolkit and is written entirely in C#.

For information about installing and using the library have a look at: http://wpfdatagridformat.codeplex.com/documentation
